Install:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("gsimchoni/kandinsky")
```

Load:
```{r}
library(kandinsky)
```

Generate a random Kandinsky painting:
```{r}
kandinsky()
```

Generate a Kandinsky Painting from the `mtcars` dataset:
```{r}
kandinsky(mtcars)
```
